Class PlayerMenu

      • clickRect

        public boolean clickRect(processing.core.PApplet marker,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         int width,
                         int height)
        Parameters:
        marker - - PApplet upon which this boolean sees if the mouse is clicked
        x - - the x coordinate of the rectangle
        y - - the y coordinate of the rectangle
        width - - the horizontal width of the rectangle
        height - - the vertical height of the rectangle
        Returns:
        - whether or not the mouse has clicked on the rectangle
